DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effectiveness Rehabilitation Services Survivors Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator seek answer three question : 1 . What person- system-level factor associate use rehabilitation service follow acute ischemic stroke ? 2 . Among stroke survivor discharge short-term inpatient rehabilitation , high-intensity service perform Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility ( IRF ) effective low intensity service perform Skilled Nursing Facility ( SNF ) , improve patient outcome 3 12 month ? 3 . Among stroke survivor discharge home , early follow-up physician effective follow-up 7 day 3 12 month ?
DOC.criteria: acute ischemic stroke within Get With GuidelinesStroke data set 20062008 , successfully link Medicare claim 2009 death index hospitalization
